isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - POWER DISTRIBUTION & GROUND SYSTEM - OPERATION - Accessory Power

svcproc.title: Accessory Power
svcproc.para: Battery power from the B1 battery stud is applied to the common terminal (30) of the accessory relay and to the key switch "B" terminal. Refer to 12V POWER DISTRIBUTION - ACCESSORY circuit diagram in CTS-5119S. With the key switch in the ACC position (or IGN position), power from the key switch "A" terminal:

step1.para: Applies power energizing the accessory adapter relay(149), applying power to A3 accessory adapter (501).
Applies power to A1 Accessory Adapter (499) and to the Electric Wiper Intermittent Relay.

svcproc.para: With 3+1 System, refer to 3+1 Battery System.
